text: We must live each day like our last
Your past does not define your future. You have the power to create the life you deserve.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: You are not alone. We are all in this together, supporting each other on the path to healing.
Recovery is not a sprint, but a marathon. Keep moving forward, one step at a time.
Courage doesn't happen when you have all the answers. It happens when you are ready to face the questions you have been avoiding.
author: Shannon L. Alder

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Concucius

text: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
author: Carl Bard

text: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
author: Carl Jung

text: Recovery is something that you have to work on every single day and it’s something that doesn’t get a day off.
author: Demi Lovato
